casebody.data:
SAM RAYBURN MUNICIPAL POWER AGENCY
v.
Ralph J. GILLIS & another.1 18-P-679 Appeals Court of Massachusetts. Entered: May 13, 2019

The matter is remanded to the Superior Court for the limited purpose of allowing the judge, upon proper motion, to amend or to correct the judgment to reflect the damages and interest thereon. In all other respects, the judgment is affirmed.
